events.name: Throwback Thursdays with DJ Manny Duke
events.description: Featuring deep cuts, party anthems and remixes nostalgic songs from two of the best decades of music with the very best music from the 90's and 2000's

events.name: Led Zeppelin Tribute
events.description: Keeping the spirit and sound of the legendary band, Led Zeppelin, Misty Mountain plays all the classic songs we love

events.name: Kool And The Gang
events.description: The kings of feel-good vibes and funky grooves, Kool and the Gang scored some of the most iconic hits of the disco era.

events.name: Jam Concert Live
events.address: 70 W 115th St New York, New York(NY), 10026
events.description: The most diverse dj on the east coast, DJ RNB team up once again to bring you the next installment in the high energy, Jam Concert Live series!

events.name: UnMute Rock Festival
events.address: 55 La Salle St #12K New York, New York(NY), 10027
events.performers: Big Wednesday, Black Pyre, Calling Apollo
events.description: With bands from around the UK ready to send the roof into orbit, get ready for the loudest Welsh festival: the inaugural UnMute 2021.

events.name: Soul Kitchen Party
events.address: 60 Gramercy Park N #2 New York, New York(NY), 10010
events.performers: A-Trak, Nightmares on Wax, Rakim, Jay Electronica
events.description: Dope party which features Hip Hop legends, emerging artists and world-class turntablists

events.name: Boom Dance Festival Experience
events.address: 966 Lexington Ave New York, New York(NY), 10021
events.performers: DJ LUCK & MC NEAT, NICKY BLACKMARKET, DJ NICKY BLACKMARKET, RATPACK
events.description: It's looking more and more like we will be seeing events return in the summer! To celebrate this we are arranging a festival experience to say good bye to lock down! We will also be celebrating the fact Zoom Dance is one year old!

events.name: Encore Night Boat Party
events.address: 675 Water St New York, New York(NY), 10002
events.description: Who is ready to party? I mean in the middle of the water, a boat with good music and drinks. If thats you then you have made it to the right place.

events.name: Emilie Surtees - Soulful Sounds
events.description: Emilie Surtees & her band are going to turn up the heat with a musical tribute to the Queens, Chaka Khan, Tina Turner and Donna Summer

events.name: Ed Sheeran
events.address: 1 Metlife Stadium Dr East Rutherford, NJ
events.description: Ed Sheeran brings his '+-=x' Tour to Metlife Stadium
